trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There was one other sighting in Philadelphia on or around January 24th 2009
Summary: It was a bright light in the sky with a lot of airplanes and helicopters around it..
divs: Sighting DetailsI was on Kelly Drive by the river and it was a very bright light in the sky i thought it was a satilight at first but then i saw it moving back and fourth and there were a lot of airplains and helicopters around it so i started recording it on my camera phone and ran out of memory so i went home to get my camcorder ant it was gone a lot of people saw it though...
